ComicInfo.Summary:
My Son, the Mortician: Lemuel struggles to learn the family business.
Angel in Black: Old Katherina had attended every funeral in town for years until it was time to attend her own.
Deathmask for the Living: A costume maker's disfigured son is mistaken as a scary costume.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Murray Boltinoff,Bill Dennehy,Carl Wessler,Bill Dennehy,George Kashdan
